description:
The merge request at https://review.openstack.org/#change,897 needed documentation, but it's such a large merge that the contributors would like to contribute documentation separately. This bug tracks that work.

Specifically, the expectations are for documentation for these two categories:

Python dev docs: in the nova/doc/source directory, write an .rst document that describes to other Python devs how this feature fits into the nova framework. Also the Python doc-strings are autodocumented from source and published to nova.openstack.org.

editing to remove the Cloud Admin docs and move them to a new doc bug.
title: Xen Storage Manager Volume Driver needs dev documentation

comments.content:
The merge request at https://review.openstack.org/#change,897 needed documentation, but it's such a large merge that the contributors would like to contribute documentation separately. This bug tracks that work. 

Specifically, the expectations are for documentation for these two categories:

Python dev docs: in the nova/doc/source directory, write an .rst document that describes to other Python devs how this feature fits into the nova framework. Also the Python doc-strings are autodocumented from source and published to nova.openstack.org.

Cloud admin docs: All the nova-manage sm commands need to be documented in the https://github.com/openstack/openstack-manuals project. Also any configuration you must do to get this feature working is required. Ideally the documents describe the feature much like the wiki page and give how-to information, reference information, and conceptual information for configuring your OpenStack cloud to use the new nova-volume driver. The relevant XML documents are:
openstack-manuals/doc/src/docbkx/openstack-compute-admin/computeconfigure.xml
openstack-manuals/doc/src/docbkx/openstack-compute-admin/computeadmin.xml
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~annegentle
